TopicTitle: Well, I thought it was an arch....

Articles.Content:
[spoiler WARNING]

So, for my first mission, I decided to land on the mun. I knew that the mun arch was near the edge of a crater.

I spotted a white pixel, and thought it was the mun arch

When I landed, I descovered the Neil armstrong memorial! However, there was something funny about it

Glitch?

Jeb wasn't happy about the landing site. So, he decided to precison fly.

Fact: As I was building the lander, I wanted it to look like the Lunar Module
Yeah the new texture for the Mun has messed around with a lot of bases, rovers and anomalies. I am sure it will be fixed soon enough though, the issue is well known.
